name: Steam Blast
description:
Steam Blast is a 3d Platformer taking place in a steampunk city.  You play as a spy that need to infiltrate a mysterious factory. Use your steam mines to navigate through the city and reach the factory.

Don't forget to have fun before anything!

Minimal Technical Requirements

  • Operational System: Windows 7 64-Bit
  • Memory: 2GB
  • Processor: Intel Core 2GHz
  • Graphic card: DirectX 11 or DirectX 12 compatible graphic cards
  • Total RAM: 4 GB
  • Screen Resolution: 1024 * 768 pixels

How to Play

Keyboard : Use ZQSD or WASD or the directional keys to move. Use Spacebar to jump, and Mouse to move the camera.

Use left click to launch a mine and right click to retrieve the mines.
Use Tab, Enter or Escape to pause the game and open the menu.

Gamepad : Use Left joystick to move. Use A button to jump, and Right joystick to move the camera.
Use right shoulder to launch a mine and left shoulder to retrieve the mines.
 Use START button to pause the game and open the menu.
